oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-06-02 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 2, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Don Slayman, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Rod Brasfield; Jean Shepard; Don Slayman; Lew Childre
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces George Morgan -- Send For My Baby (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, George Morgan) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Jean Shepard -- He Loved Me Once And He'll Love Me Again (Jean Shepard) -- George Morgan introduces Don Slayman and Lew Childre -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Don Slayman fiddle, Lew Childre calls) -- George Morgan talks -- Steal Away (George Morgan) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Slayman, Don (Musician); Shepard, Jean, 1933-; Morgan, George, 1925-1975
